short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verify if an email address or website is affiliated with the SA governemnt or some SOEs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To reduce the number of people falling victim to scammers posing as government agencies, GoVerify compares the provided email address to the ones in our database. We'll continue adding more data in order to make it harder for scammers to scam.
